page.title: 06A DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content: I get up around 8.00 oclock in the morning.Then I get ready and have breakfast which varies from day to day.Then I wash.Then I set off to school,and get there about 9.00 oclock. when I get to cIass we all go to practical with Mr Hills. I like pottery as I make things out of clay. We have French next, followed by Humanities and then Assembly. Then I go to class, get maths and go home. I have tea and go out to with my brother over to the Denes High School's playing field. We push the goal posts over, turn them upside down to play see-saw with the posts. Then my brother kisses his girl friend and we get onto our bicycles to go home.
